items.title: Trump fires lead official on economic data as tariffs cause market drop
items.description: The move comes as a weaker-than-expected jobs report stoked fears about tariffs.

items.title: Watch: Hot dog spill clogs US highway
items.description: Thousands of hot dogs spilled onto a Pennsylvania highway after a lorry scraped a car.

items.title: And Just Like That... Sex and the City reboot's third season to be its last
items.description: The season's finale will mark the end of the "Sex and the City universe", its showrunner announced.

items.title: Chess grandmaster Carlsen wins at Esports World Cup
items.description: World number one Magnus Carlsen takes home $250,000 (Â£188,000) for winning the online competition.

items.title: They escaped Ukraine's frontlines. The sound of drones followed them
items.description: As technology transforms the war in Ukraine, soldiers are experiencing a new form of trauma: "Droneophobia".
